other_tests.findings: Many of the larger retinal vessels are dilated and tortuous, with some appearing to dive into or arise from plaque-like areas; extensive telangiectasia and formation of microaneurysms observed.
No evidence of extraocular tumor, tumor at the surgical margin of the optic nerve, or optic-nerve enlargement noted upon intraoperative examination.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient was free of tumor 20 months after the original diagnosis and enucleation.

other_tests.findings: No evidence of optic-nerve tumor found.
